dashboard.label: Test Detection List
dashboard.description: All detections bundled in this app

search.query: | rest /services/saved/searches count=0 | search eai:acl.app="Josh_Test" | eval Type=if(action.correlationsearch.enabled=1,"Correlation","Saved Search"), disabled=if(disabled=1,"Yes","No") | rename title AS "Detection Name", cron_schedule AS "Schedule", action.notable.param.severity AS "Severity" | table "Detection Name", Type, Severity, Schedule, Enabled
